memberSignatures.value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Chr.Avro.Resolution.ITypeResolutionResult ResolveType(class System.Type type) cil managed

returns.summary: A subclass of <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution" /> that contains information about the type.

overloads.summary:
Resolves information for a .NET type. If the case does not apply to the provided type,
            this method should throw <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" />.
